name: The Fearful Sheep
description:
In The Fearful Sheep you need to save a sheep from an island. But you don't have any control on it! As a shepherd use your dog to scary the sheep and "guide" her to the ship!

-- CONTROLS --

WASD to move the shepherd

Left Mouse Button to launch a bone

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK2020 Jam with the theme "Out of Control". I think that this game fit the theme because the sheep is out of our control, and the only way to make it to move is to scary it!
